title: What is Deep Learning?
content:
Deep Learning is a specialized subset of Machine Learning inspired by the structure and function of the human brain's neural networks.

It utilizes Artificial Neural Networks (ANNs) with multiple layers (hence 'deep') to learn representations of data with multiple levels of abstraction. Unlike traditional machine learning, deep learning models can automatically learn features from raw data, eliminating the need for manual feature engineering.

This hierarchical learning allows deep learning models to discover intricate patterns in large datasets, leading to breakthroughs in areas like image recognition, natural language processing, and speech recognition.
